title: Best of the Program | Guest: Guest: Ken Paxton | 4/28/22
description:
Glenn takes calls from listeners about what’s affecting them most, their biggest questions, and what’s to come. Texas AG Ken Paxton gives an exclusive interview as the state files a lawsuit against the Biden administration’s new asylum rule. President Biden wants $33 billion more to send to Ukraine, while Russia keeps talking about nukes and the media seemingly cheers on the war’s escalation.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
